newsitem.title: USA: Pinnacle West names CFO, board members.
newsitem.headline: Pinnacle West names CFO, board members.

text.p: Pinnacle West Capital Corp on Wednesday said it named George Schreiber as the new executive vice president and chief financial officer of Pinnacle West and its subsidiary, Arizona Public Service.
In addition, Schreiber and Arizona Public Service's Chief Operating Officer Bill Post have been named to Pinnacle West's board of directors.
Post replaces a retiring Mark DeMichele and Schreiber replaces a retiring Henry Sargent, who also retired from the chief financial officer position at Pinnacle West last year.
As chief financial officer of Arizona Public Service, Schreiber replaces Jaron Norberg, who recently retired from the subsidiary, a company spokesman said.

Schreiber most recently was Managing Director at PaineWebber Inc in New York. Prior to that he was a Director at The First Boston Corporation, where he headed the Utilities and Telecommunications Group.
